page.title: 13 A DENTON CRAFT ENTERPRISE
page.content: (cont'd from P.12) I made as many novelty and cheap items as my imagination allowed. I decided to offer to open the parties with a talk on the history and basic techniques behind one of the crafts, and this involved much research. These talks have proved to be very popular, and I hope that at least a few people have been introduced to a new hobby in this way.One of the most popular talks explains how to make beauty preparations from herbs and foods,and the guests particularly enjoy passing around some of the recipes. Having persuaded a friend to give a party,I launched my business,and soon learned to do my Christmas shopping in the summer before the busy Autumn months.A friend now helps me to unload and sell the goods.
